Comment 3: 
If we make the compiler comply with the spec, it would compile the
program into an unconditional
    runtime.panic("...")
The portability arguments are good ones: at the least we should define
what can be passed to make. Is it always int? Can you pass an int64
value (I believe you can but haven't checked)? And so on.

Do you know what gccgo does?
